reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: 1. Project: 11590 Evaluations and assessments:#FCA aims to maintain a quality programme and effectiveness of work in all its country programmes. In 2019 FCA will conduct two country programme evaluations and include two FCA staff members into the evaluatio n teams to support learning. Learning will happen by learning from other FCA Country programmes and in general about conducting an evaluation. The country programme evaluations will be conducted in Eritrea and the Central African Republic. Project level ev aluations and assessments are for the most part included into projects and country programmes.#2. The main objective and the expected results:# Produce relevant information for FCA programme development purposes# Develop the programme quality#Expected resu lts:# Two country programme evaluations conducted # Learning has taken place within FCA (from other Country Programmes and evaluation practices)#3. Implementing partner: FCA, External consultants will be hired to assure objectivity of the evaluations
